page.title: 04Mrs.Russell's Day
page.content:
My mum gets up at{5.45am}milks{7 goats and feeds{9 kids.}She eats breakfast and wakes up the family at{7.00am.} When we are ready for school at{8.00am she walks us to the bus stop. Mum walks home. If it is a nice day she cycles to the chapel where they hold the {playgroup.}She and her helpers work there{9.00}till{12.00.}My mum rides back home feeds the goats, then has her lunch and works in the garden until{3.00pm}when it is time to pick my brother and I up from the bus stop We walk home and mum makes tea. At about{6.45pm}she milks the goats and at{9.00pm}she feeds their kids. At {10.00pm}she goes to bed .
by{Jane Russell {
